title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Introducing the Suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors, your ultimate solution for a safer and more pleasant outdoor environment. This premium, ultrasonic snake repellent utilizes advanced technology to effectively deter snakes and a variety of other unwanted animals.

Product Features:
- Ultrasonic technology: Emits ultrasonic sound waves every 30 seconds to deter snakes and other unwanted animals.
- Wide coverage: Each device covers up to 7000 sq. ft., ensuring maximum protection for your property.
- Premium material and maximum durability: Built to withstand various weather conditions and outdoor elements.
- Solar-powered: Harness the power of the sun to keep your devices charged and running efficiently.
- Waterproof rating: IP44 rated for protection against water splashes from any angle.
- Safe for children and pets: Chemical-free and harmless to humans and pets, ensuring a worry-free experience.
- Effectiveness time: The devices will start showing results within 2-4 weeks of being set up.
- Additional repellent properties: Effective against deer, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels.

Installation Instructions:
- Initial charge: Ensure a full charge by leaving the devices in the sun for 4-5 hours before use.
- Installation height: Place the devices 2 inches above the soil for optimal performance.

Tips:
- For best results, turn on the devices and place them in direct sunlight for 4-5 hours to ensure a full charge.

Frequency: 400+/-100 Hz

Embrace a safer and more comfortable outdoor environment with the Suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors. Say goodbye to unwanted critters and enjoy your outdoor spaces with peace of mind.
